inclusion.criterion: Women with menopausal Vasomotor symptoms (VMS) bothersome enough to warrant treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Minimum of 7 hot flashes per day (on average)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Age limits: women ages 40-70 who have had at least one missed menstrual cycle or have undergone spontaneous menopause, women of any age who have medically induced menopause, women of any age who have had oophorectomy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant illness with reasonable likelihood of limiting survival to less than one year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy known, suspected or planned in next year
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 67-year-old healthy woman with no underlying disease. She takes daily multivitamins and anti-hypertensive drugs.
